name: $addGiveawayEntry
description: Add a user entry to a giveaway by adding the reaction (requires bot permissions).

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

args.name: user ID
args.description: The user ID to add as an entry.

name: $deleteGiveaway
description: Delete a giveaway by its message ID. Optionally keep the message.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway to delete.

args.name: doNotDeleteMessage
args.description: Whether to keep the giveaway message (default false).

name: $drawGiveawayWinners
description: Manually pick winners for a giveaway.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

args.name: winner count
args.description: Number of winners to pick (optional, ignored if not supported).

name: $editGiveaway
description: Edit an ongoing giveaway (prize, duration, winner count).

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The ID of the giveaway to edit.

args.name: prize
args.description: New prize (optional).

args.name: duration
args.description: New duration in ms (optional).

args.name: winner count
args.description: New winner count (optional).

name: $getActiveGiveaways
description: List all currently running giveaways (not ended).

name: $getGiveawayEntries
description: Get all user IDs who have entered a giveaway.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

name: $getGiveawayInfo
description: Fetch all details about a giveaway by its message ID.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

name: $hasUserEntered
description: Check if a specific user has entered a giveaway.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

args.name: user ID
args.description: The user ID to check.

name: $pauseGiveaway
description: Pause a giveaway by its message ID.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway to pause.

args.name: options
args.description: Pause options (optional).

name: $removeGiveawayEntry
description: Remove a user entry from a giveaway by removing their reaction.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway.

args.name: user ID
args.description: The user ID to remove from entries.

args.name: channel ID
args.description: The channel to start the giveaway in.

args.name: duration
args.description: Duration in ms.

args.name: winner count
args.description: Number of winners.

args.name: prize
args.description: Prize for the giveaway.

args.name: host ID
args.description: User ID of the giveaway host.

name: $unpauseGiveaway
description: Unpause a giveaway by its message ID.

args.name: giveaway ID
args.description: The message ID of the giveaway to unpause.
